java/liquibase/database/sql/AlterSequenceStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class AlterSequenceStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007 
00008     private String schemaName;
00009     private String sequenceName;
00010     private Integer incrementBy;
00011     private Integer maxValue;
00012     private Integer minValue;
00013     private Boolean ordered;
00014 
00015     public AlterSequenceStatement(String schemaName, String sequenceName) {
00016         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00017         this.sequenceName = sequenceName;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public String getSchemaName() {
00021         return schemaName;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getSequenceName() {
00025         return sequenceName;
00026     }
00027 
00028     public Integer getIncrementBy() {
00029         return incrementBy;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public AlterSequenceStatement setIncrementBy(Integer incrementBy) {
00033         this.incrementBy = incrementBy;
00034         return this;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public Integer getMaxValue() {
00038         return maxValue;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public AlterSequenceStatement setMaxValue(Integer maxValue) {
00042         this.maxValue = maxValue;
00043         return this;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public Integer getMinValue() {
00047         return minValue;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public AlterSequenceStatement setMinValue(Integer minValue) {
00051         this.minValue = minValue;
00052         return this;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public Boolean getOrdered() {
00056         return ordered;
00057     }
00058 
00059     public AlterSequenceStatement setOrdered(Boolean ordered) {
00060         this.ordered = ordered;
00061         return this;
00062     }
00063 
00064     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00065         if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00066             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00067         }
00068 
00069         StringBuffer buffer = new StringBuffer();
00070         buffer.append("ALTER SEQUENCE ");
00071         buffer.append(database.escapeSequenceName(getSchemaName(), getSequenceName()));
00072 
00073         if (getIncrementBy() != null) {
00074             if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase || database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00075                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database does not support altering sequences with increment", this, database);
00076             } else {
00077                 buffer.append(" INCREMENT BY ").append(getIncrementBy());
00078             }
00079         }
00080         if (getMinValue() != null) {
00081             if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase || database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00082                 buffer.append(" RESTART WITH ").append(getMinValue());
00083             } else {
00084                 buffer.append(" MINVALUE ").append(getMinValue());
00085             }
00086         }
00087 
00088         if (getMaxValue() != null) {
00089             if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase || database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00090                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database does not support altering sequences with maxValue", this, database);
00091             } else {
00092                 buffer.append(" MAXVALUE ").append(getMaxValue());
00093             }
00094         }
00095 
00096         if (getOrdered() != null) {
00097             if (database instanceof OracleDatabase || database instanceof DB2Database || database instanceof MaxDBDatabase) {
00098                 if (getOrdered()) {
00099                     buffer.append(" ORDER");
00100                 }
00101             } else {
00102                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database does not support creating sequences with 'order'", this, database);
00103             }
00104         }
00105 
00106         return buffer.toString();
00107     }
00108 
00109     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00110         return ";";
00111     }
00112 
00113     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00114         return database.supportsSequences();
00115     }
00116 }
